title: Rogan, STOP Apologizing to Those Who Don't Care | 2/7/22
description:
Glenn and Stu start the show with the latest Joe Rogan controversy, as the Left continues to vilify those who go against the leftist narrative. Glenn uses his cancellation experience to predict what’s coming next for Joe Rogan. GoFundMe is being investigated after removing the fundraiser for the Canadian trucker Freedom Convoy. Glenn goes on a rant about the Chinese Olympics and NBC. Glenn discusses Ray Dalio's opinion that America is headed toward civil war. Glenn warns of the silencing of conservative voices if the Left is successful in canceling Joe Rogan. Glenn and Stu discuss how the Joe Rogan controversy is evidence that the Left cannot live near opposing viewpoints. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
